hero.subtitle: Transforming Data Into Value
hero.description: Computer Engineer with 6+ years of experience in analytics, data engineering, MLOps, DevOps and architecture using Azure technology stack. Building innovative data platforms and AI solutions with agile methodologies.

achievements: Designed and developed ML Framework for classical machine learning projects
Provided support and workflow improvements for data and AI teams with best practices
Generalized DevOps solutions and created infrastructure deployment pipelines

job2.role: Big Data & Power BI Senior Consultant
achievements: Designed architecture for terrestrial mobility platform analyzing geographic data for air services
Implemented data platforms with ETL systems using CI/CD and testing on Microsoft technologies
Developed financial dashboards automating balance and cash flow calculations
Designed Data Vault and Kimball architectures in Big Data projects
Built scalable ETL processes in Azure Synapse Analytics and Databricks
Created data warehouses in Kimball architecture and analytical models for BI
Developed Power BI reports and ETL processes in SSIS, ADF and Synapse Analytics

ml_framework.title: ML Framework for Classical ML
ml_framework.description: Designed and developed a comprehensive framework for classical machine learning projects with training, evaluation, deployment pipelines and model versioning across environments

mobility.title: Air Services Mobility Platform
mobility.description: Architecture design and implementation for terrestrial mobility analysis platform. Optimized decision-making for new vertiports by analyzing geographic data and route optimization

financial.title: Financial Dashboard Automation
financial.description: Developed automated financial dashboards following general accounting standards, calculating balances, cash flows and key financial metrics

data_platform.title: Enterprise Data Platforms
data_platform.description: Implemented multiple data platforms with ETL systems using CI/CD, testing, and BI dashboards on Microsoft technologies for improved decision-making

powerbi.title: Azure Power BI Data Analyst Associate

information_collection.title: Information Collection
information_collection.description: This website is a personal portfolio and blog. We do not collect personal information unless you voluntarily provide it through contact forms or email.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.description: This website may use basic analytics to understand visitor behavior. No personal identifying information is collected through these analytics.

contact_info.title: Contact Information
contact_info.description: When you contact us through email or contact forms, we only use your information to respond to your inquiry.

third_party.title: Third-Party Services
third_party.description: This website may link to third-party services like LinkedIn, GitHub, and email providers. These services have their own privacy policies.

data_protection.title: Data Protection
data_protection.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect any information you provide to us.

changes.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at:
